info.description: PizzaBot, launched on May 27, 2022, is a Discord bot that offers a variety of features, including server analytics, moderation, autorole, ticketing, customizable games, advanced profiles, reaction triggers, an integrated economy, and AI-powered features like message translation and question answering.
DotMusic is an advanced music discord bot with search-history, musical suggestions, time-control and more...

The project was born in 2024, with the foundations of another application that failed in 2023, to give all communities a bot useful in managing and moderating their community, with popular and custom integrations, one of the largest is ZYNKO, a social media.
